game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of King Arthur
game.description: Legend has it that King Arthur's treasure was lost after his demise. Your task is to find this great trove of wealth and honor.

tasks.description: You need to find the ancient map that holds the location of King Arthur's treasure. It is believed to be in the Forbidden Forest.
The map holds a puzzle that reveals the true location of the treasure. Use all your brainpower to solve it.
The treasure is guarded by a powerful entity. Be prepared to fight a formidable foe!
Once the guardian is defeated, the treasure is yours to claim!
